item.title: DEERE CO 10-K
item.description: DEERE CO, which is in the Farm Machinery & Equipment [3523] industry, SEC 10-K filing on December 15, 2022 had 40571 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 609 instances deere - 547 instances john - 472 instances 2022 - 438 instances equipment - 403 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
